author: wtopstaff
title: Capitals-Flames Sum
text:
1—2 
First Period_1, Calgary, Monahan 2 (Gaudreau), 9:00. 2, Washington, Burakovsky 1 (Kuznetsov), 16:02. 
Second Period_3, Washington, Ovechkin 4 (Orpik, Kuznetsov), :30. 4, Washington, Backstrom 2 (Williams, Carlson), 10:56. 5, Washington, Oshie 3 (Kuznetsov, Ovechkin), 11:37. 
Third Period_6, Calgary, Giordano 1 (Frolik, Gaudreau), 3:09. 7, Washington, Chimera 2 (Beagle), 6:53. 8, Washington, Backstrom 3 (Williams, Niskanen), 16:14. 
Shots on Goal_Washington 7-13-10_30. Calgary 7-4-8_19. 
Goalies_Washington, Holtby. Calgary, Ramo, Hiller. A_18,303 (19,289). T_2:28. Topics:
